hooks.command: bash -c 'REPO_ROOT=$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel 2>/dev/null); if [ -z "$REPO_ROOT" ]; then exit 0; fi; MAIN_ROOT=$(cd "$REPO_ROOT" && git rev-parse --path-format=absolute --git-common-dir 2>/dev/null | sed "s|/.git$||" ); if [ "$REPO_ROOT" = "$MAIN_ROOT" ]; then exit 0; fi; if [ ! -f "$REPO_ROOT/.env.local" ] && [ -f "$MAIN_ROOT/.env.local" ]; then ln -s "$MAIN_ROOT/.env.local" "$REPO_ROOT/.env.local" && echo "Symlinked .env.local from main repo into worktree"; fi'
